name: Narmada Kidney Foundation

address: B/ 01, Nav Sanyukta Co op. Society Ltd. G. Floor
Behind Jai Mata Di Temple, Dr. Charat Singh Colony, A.G. Link Road, Chakala, Andheri east

briefDescription: Narmada Kidney Foundation was founded in year 1993. It is a non government organization that aims to help people with kidney disease. The foundation’s guiding principle is “Life shared life lived”. The foundation believes that the knowledge is strength supreme & sharing knowledge will help to achieve their goal.The main aim of the Narmada Kidney Foundation Trust is to educate people to prevent kidney disease, educate kidney patients to understand their disease and promote organ transplantation.
